Welcome to my blog! This is the personal blog of Young Eun Jeon, coming to you from Korea. 
This is where I'm going to record what I'm studying, especially the analyses using R. 

To give you a brief introduction of me,

- B.S. Statistics, Yeungnam University, Korea, 2018.02
- Ph.D student from Yeungnam University, Korea, 2024,02.
- Interests :  Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Time series, Spatial statistics etc.
